messages.dataFileHasInvalidFormat: It seems like the file ${filePath} has an invalid format as freitag was not able to parse it.
messages.fileNotFound: Couldn't find file ${filePath}. Is the 'srcFolder' in your freitag.json correct?
messages.fileNotFoundLinkIncorrect: Couldn't find file ${filePath}. Please check that it's linked correctly.
messages.fileNotRenderedDueToUnmatchingFolderName: ${file} ignored because the parent directory doesn't have the same name.
messages.htmlValidationFailed: HTML validation failed. Most likely something went wrong with https://validator.w3.org/nu/. Maybe you also ran into rate limiting.
messages.missingEngine: Please specify your javascript engine in freitag.json (key: 'engine', type: String).
messages.missingExtension: Please specify the file extension of your components in freitag.json (key: 'extension', type: String).
messages.missingSrcFolder: Please specify the location of your components in freitag.json (key: 'srcFolder', type: String).
messages.noDataSetForVariation: No data defined for variation "${variation}" in ${file}.
messages.nodeEndAndKeysDontMatch: Your NODE_ENV '${nodeEnv}' doesn't match the keys you defined in folders.assets in your freitag.json, so freitag is not able to deliver your ${assetType} files.
messages.noNameSetForVariation: No name defined for variation ${i} in ${file}.
messages.serverStartedButUserConfigUnparseable: freitag wasn't able to parse your config file.
messages.settingEngineFailed: Setting the rendering engine failed. Are you sure the engine defined in your freitag.json is correct?
messages.updatingStarted: A file has been changed, freitag is updating the state.
messages.wrongFileType: ${fileName} has not the correct file type.
